mapper.insert: INSERT INTO education_experiences (student_user_id, school_name, degree_level, major, start_date, end_date, major_rank) VALUES (#{studentUserId}, #{schoolName}, #{degreeLevel}, #{major}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{majorRank})
mapper.update: UPDATE education_experiences SET school_name = #{schoolName}, degree_level = #{degreeLevel}, major = #{major}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, major_rank = #{majorRank} WHERE id = #{id} AND student_user_id = #{studentUserId}
